message: Let's be fair, 60% for me is a good starting point.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation advantage I have in the next round.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
I'm willing to go up to 52/48, but I'm starting to feel like this is going nowhere. Maybe we should just call it a draw and split it 50/50.
I'm still not willing to go below 56%, considering I'm losing a lot to inflation.
